name: Diner 87
description:
As the opening of the long-awaited diner took place near the town of Mijbirt, the unexpected occurred, leaving terror among the surrounding customers of the restaurant. As investigators poured down major efforts in search for the lead of two missing cases within the scene, the diner would eventually be closed down for safety reasons, however, one detective is skeptical of the occurrence of both cases, beginning the mark of another investigation to find the real culprit behind the tragedy of the diner.

W, A, S, D |Key| - Move

E |Key| - Interact

Left Shift - Sprint

F |Key| - Toggle Flashlight
